walletDownloaded.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

sat.title: What is a sat?
sat.text:
Sat is a small portion of a Bitcoin. The same way a dollar can be divided in 100 cts, a bitcoin can be divided in 100,000,000 sats!

Why is that important? As we'll learn down the road, divisbility is an important part of money. But for now, let's just remember that sats are a small part of a bitcoin :)

custody.title: what is custody?
custody.text:
Literally, custody means "the protective care or guardianship of someone or something".

Ok, that‚Äôs a boring definition, what does it mean for bitcoin or banking?

When you give your money at your bank, they are taking custody. It basically means they are taking care of it.

With bitcoin, you can also give custody to someone else, like you would do for your bank, but you can also take self custody of your assets!

In that sense, this would be a little bit like cash. The money is in your wallet, if you lose it you‚Äôre out of luck.

Galoy is what we call a ‚Äúnon custodial‚Äù wallet. It means money is in your pocket, right on your phone!

backupWallet.title: Backup wallet
backupWallet.text:
Now that you have some sats, you need to back up your wallet to iCloud so you never lose access to your bitcoin. 

 Unlike traditional dollar, you own your bitcoin with keys stored in your mobile phone, which is why taking care of saving your keys is essential
